description: Meadow adds a complete overhaul to the biome, you can now find new trees, stones, flowers, animals and even campsites and other structures where you may rest or trade with their inhabitants

Among these new animals you will find many new types of cows, with their milk and the milk of other animals you may start your journey to become the greatest cheesemaker ever known, but beware of the brown bears, they aren't nearly as friendly as the cows
And if cooking isn't enough, with these new resources found on the meadows you will be able to craft a great range of decorations
